text:
Oh, no! Oh, what a mess! Oh, I am going to
be late for school. Oh. Oh, hey, hello boys

and girls. I am looking for some things for
school. I need my pen, my pencil, my rubber,

my ruler, my pencil sharpener. Oh, where is
everything! Oh, hehey, look! What´s that?

What is it? Well done! This is my favourite
dark blue pen. Great!

Hey Steve!
Yes, Maggie?

Let´s play! Let´s play!
Maggie I can´t play. I am trying to find

the things I need for school.
Hey, I can help find everything you need.

Aaahh, there is my pencil sharpener.
Abracadabra!

Hey, I´ve got my pencil sharpener.
Oh! Oh no, what is it? Oh, what is it? Oh,

what is it? Oh look, it´s a pencil sharpener.
Oh no! Help!

Hey, look. It´s a pencil sharpener. It´s
a pencil sharpener.

Great! But it´s crazy. It´s too big.
It´s not too big. You´re small.

Steve! Steve! Don´t be scared. Let´s play!
What? It´s Maggie magic!

Yeah!
Wow! Hey, look. Everything I need for school

is here.
Yeah!

But it´s all really big. Look! Wow! Look!
I am jumping on a big rubber. What a big rubber!

Hey, it gives me an idea. Yeah!
Push, Steve! Push!

What´s Steve doing? Go on, yeah!
Oh, look! Look! Great! Ok, put this up. Here.

Ok. Super. Ok.
Oh, what has Steve got?

Look at this pencil. What colour is the pencil?
Yeah. It´s black and yellow. It´s a black

and yellow pencil. Ok, put that pencil up
here. Finished! Ok, now it´s time to play.

Come on!
Look at my playground.

Wow!
What can we do? Hey, we can jump on the rubber.

Yeah!
Both: Jump, jump, jump!

Well done! Hey, watch this!
Now say it with me. Up here. What is it? It´s

a pencil. It´s a pencil. It´s a pencil.
Well done! Oh, look! Now we can slide down

the ruler. Hey, what colour is the ruler?
Light green.

Yeah, it´s light green. It´s a light green
ruler.

Oh, be careful!
That was great! But it´s time to go to school

now. So, Maggie, make me big again.
Ok. Abracadabra!

Maggie! Stop playing around!
Ok. Abracadabra!

That was crazy. Maggie, you naughty naughty
bird!
